question:
Which of the following was / were the Judicial Reforms by Lord Cornwallis?
  1. Abolishing the judicial functions of the Zamindars.
  2. Bringing of the judicial proceedings in writing
  3. Administration justice according to Quran for Muslims and Shastras for Hindus
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
Judicial Reforms of Lord Cornwallis
  • Abolishing the judicial functions of the Zamindars.
  • Establishment of the Civil and Criminal Courts in districts.
  • Establishment of Sa dr-Dew ani Adalat and Sadr-Nizamat.
  • Bringing of the judicial prcceedings in writing.
  • Appointment of Indian Judges in Criminal Courts.
  • Administration justice according to Quran for Muslims and Shastras for Hindus .
